column4: Greetings and salutations, I was wondering if there was perhaps a knowledgeable guru in here willing to loan a  helping hand
My question is pertaining to avant window navagator I went to the IRC room for awn and no one would help
Best bet is just ask and perhaps someone can help :-)
Well check in the Ubuntu Software Center...I found a developer version of the fglrx driver for my ATI card.
